summary: The diff implements all four requirements (REQ-57 through REQ-61) with good coverage. Backend adds the stable radar map and three new functions; frontend adds the three new hooks, the Add to Radar button in EventCard and ArtistEventPopup, and a Saved Events section in MyRadarPage. A few specific acceptance criteria have gaps worth noting.

missing_requirements.requirement: Each saved event row must show the same ticket-search buttons (Dice / Songkick) already present on other event cards.
missing_requirements.reason: The SavedEventRow component in MyRadarPage.tsx renders only a single generic 'Tickets' link using event.eventUrl, not the dual Dice / Songkick ticket-search buttons present on EventCard. The spec explicitly requires the same ticket-search buttons already present on other event cards.

missing_requirements.requirement: The stable HashMap must survive canister upgrades via a stable variable declaration.
missing_requirements.reason: The visible declaration shows `var userRadarEvents = Map.empty<Principal, Set.Set<Text>>()` without the `stable` keyword. Without stable, radar data would be lost on upgrade. The diff is truncated so this cannot be confirmed resolved elsewhere.

hallucinated_features.description: Summary stats on MyRadarPage include a new 'Saved Events' count stat card sourced from radarEvents.length.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only asks for a dedicated Saved Events section listing events; adding a new summary stat card for the saved event count was not requested anywhere in the requirements.
